resources.string: This activity set instance state. So if you push the home button and go to other apps and return it, the count number and text which you input on edittext have remained.
I input keyboardUtil class. If you touch an editText, a keyboard view covers button usually. But The layout id scrolled and you can see button because I added the keyboard utility.
You can add more views here. This textView is here for scroll more.
It sends an HTTP request to openweathermap.org API and gets a response from the API. I use Retrofit2, RXKotlin and RXAndroid.
